response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This exceptional item is priced at $1,400,000, which I believe is a fair and competitive offer considering its worth to you. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and exemplary service throughout the process. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
